repos.name: superpowers
repos.description: Complete software development workflow for coding agents by Jesse Vincent (obra). Provides composable skills for brainstorming, planning, TDD, debugging, subagent-driven development, code review, and git worktree management. Skills trigger automatically and enforce mandatory workflows. Claude Code plugin with marketplace support.

repos.name: tac
repos.description: TAC (The Agentic Coder) - Provectus internal agentic coding curriculum with 8 progressive lessons (tac-1 through tac-8). Each lesson builds a web application (Natural Language SQL Interface) using increasingly sophisticated agentic patterns: from basic Claude Code usage to full SDLC automation with ADW (AI Developer Workflow), hooks, MCP servers, and Claude Code SDK. Includes specs for each lesson and implementation artifacts.

repos.name: taches-cc-resources
repos.description: TACHES Claude Code Resources by Lex Christopherson (glittercowboy). A curated collection of 27 slash commands, 8 skills, and 3 auditor agents for Claude Code. Focused on meta-prompting, todo management, thinking models (mental frameworks), deep analysis debugging, and creating Claude Code extensions (skills, commands, hooks, subagents, MCP servers). Plugin marketplace compatible.

repos.name: agents
repos.description: Claude Code Plugins by Seth Hobson (wshobson). Massive production-ready system with 72 focused plugins, 108 specialized agents, 129 agent skills, and 72 development tools. Covers 23 categories: development, documentation, workflows, testing, quality, AI/ML, data, database, operations, performance, infrastructure, security, languages (Python, JS/TS, Rust, Go, Java, etc.), blockchain, finance, payments, gaming, marketing/SEO, business, HR/legal, and accessibility. Three-tier model strategy (Opus/Sonnet/Haiku). Claude Code marketplace compatible.

repos.name: specs
repos.description: ProAgent specification repository. Contains the comprehensive ProAgent spec (PUAF - Provectus Unified Agent Framework) for building a role-agnostic, extensible agent framework as the 'Company OS'. Includes implementation plans for 10 roles (frontend, backend, devops, data, ML, PM, HR, QA, etc.), core commands (spec-extract, interview, plan), multi-role orchestration, external repo integration, and usage analytics. Also contains gap analysis documenting what exists vs what needs to be built.

assets.description: Complete ProAgent specification: role-agnostic agent framework for all Provectus employees with 10 roles, core commands (spec-extract, interview, plan), multi-role orchestration, external repo discovery, and usage analytics. SQLite schema, integration architecture (Slack, Google Drive, GitHub), and phased acceptance criteria.
Implementation details for ProAgent core commands: spec-extract, interview, plan
Multi-role orchestration layer implementation for cross-practice workflows (PM to Dev to QA)
Developer role implementations: frontend-engineer, backend-engineer, devops-engineer
Business role implementations: project-manager, human-resources, technical-writer
Data role implementations: data-scientist, ml-engineer, qa-engineer
Integration architecture: Slack OAuth2, Google Drive API, GitHub/GitLab connectors
Usage analytics implementation: command/skill tracking, error reporting, SQLite schema
External repository discovery and integration: GitHub trending, awesome-lists, community collections
Implementation state tracking for PUAF milestones

Gap analysis comparing current state (80% Slack, 70% spec enhancement, 20% code gen, 30% GitHub deploy) with needed capabilities. Documents missing LLM integration, code generation, and GitHub write operations.

repos.name: root-claude-config
repos.description: Root-level Claude Code configuration for the Agentic Coding workspace. Contains project-wide commands (interview, multi-agent implementation) and permission settings.

assets.description: Comprehensive structured interview command for requirements gathering. 7 phases (Problem Space, UX, Technical, Edge Cases, DevOps, Business, Validation) with depth levels (quick/thorough/exhaustive). Uses AskUserQuestionTool for interactive Q&A and produces complete spec documents.

Multi-agent implementation orchestrator. Reads specs, detects work type (software/documents/product/HR/research/data/creative), distributes work across parallel sub-agents in waves with dependency management. Supports 7 work stream types with wave-based execution protocol and state tracking.
Local Claude Code settings with permission allowlist for bash commands (ls, mkdir, cat, find, grep, python compilation, test scripts)

repos.name: root-setup
repos.description: Root-level workspace setup assets for the Agentic Coding project. Includes the macOS setup script for installing all development tools.

assets.description: macOS setup script installing: Homebrew, Git, GitHub CLI, Python 3.11, Astral uv, Node.js 20, Bun, VS Code with 12 extensions (Python, Pylance, Jupyter, GitHub Copilot, ESLint, Prettier, GitLens, Docker, Remote SSH). Includes verification and per-project setup instructions.
